title: WSJ: Trump's Wasted Briefings...

content: A friend of ours who voted for President Trump sent us a note recently saying that she had stopped watching the daily White House briefings of the coronavirus task force. Why? Because they have become less about defeating the virus and more about the many feu… [+272 chars]
